dict.string: This template provides a starting point for a page-based application that uses a page view controller.

array.string:
RootViewController.swift:implementation:methods:spineLocationForInterfaceOrientation(// MARK: - UIPageViewController delegate methods
func pageViewController(_ pageViewController: UIPageViewController, spineLocationFor orientation: UIInterfaceOrientation\) -> UIPageViewController.SpineLocation)
ModelController.swift:implementation:methods:viewControllerAtIndex(func viewControllerAtIndex(_ index: Int, storyboard: UIStoryboard\) -> DataViewController?)
